timeline.content:
Hey Gabriel, 

Thanks for contacting amber for your accommodation search in London! I am Prachi and I'll be helping you book your ideal student home. 

Happy to assist you with the process ahead. Thankyou : )

Hello Gabriel,
Good morning! This is Prachi from Amber Student. We’re partnered with University College London, and we've received your booking form for the iQ Will Wyatt Court – Silver Ensuite Plus (38 weeks).

However, the emergency contact and guarantor details are missing, so I’m unable to start the booking process at the moment.

Could you please share the following details with me here on WhatsApp:

Full Name

Contact Number

Email Address

Date of Birth

Relation to You

Full Address

Once I have this information, I’ll be able to proceed with your booking. Let me know if you have any questions, I’ll be happy to assist you!

Thank you!

Let me know if you want it to sound more casual or formal.

timeline.content:
Hi Gabriel,

We would love an update from you regarding the status of your accommodation. We currently have limited availability and want to help you find accommodation that is well within your 
requirements.

Just in case, if you have already found accommodation, you can help us with the details and we can try rolling out cashbacks for you, subject to availability in London.

Also, if you have friends looking for student accommodation, you can refer them at http://amberstudent.com/refer. If your referred friend books accommodation, you will get a 50 GBP Amazon gift card.

Hello, 
I am sorry for my late response, I have already found my accommodation and want to cancel my application to Will Wyatt court. 

Thank you, 
Gabriel Galinski
